item.title: Meakin add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "There is no exquisite beauty… without some strangeness in the proportion." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Meakin add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "Every human being must be viewed according to what it is good for. For not one of us, no, not one, is perfect. And were we to love none who had imperfection, this world would be a desert for our love." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Meakin add a quote by Orlando Winters
item.description: "If a couple of gay guys want to throw the gayest, most fabulous wedding of all time, the only way it should offend you is if you weren’t invited." -- Orlando Winters

item.title: Meakin add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "Time is the substance I am made of. Time is a river which sweeps me along, but I am the river; it is a tiger which destroys me, but I am the tiger; it is a fire which consumes me, but I am the fire." -- Jorge Luis Borges
